Title: Relates to recovery of alleged overpayment of wages
Summary: Establishes a minimum threshold of five hundred dollars for recovery of overpayment of wages; provides an employee who is alleged to have been overpaid notice and an opportunity to respond to such allegation prior to the state seeking such recovery.
LawCode: Amd ยง200, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to recovery of alleged overpayment of wages
